plot outline: Abhi (Asif Ali) is leading a sweet family life with his wife Aparna(Rachana Narayanankutty) and they are very busy with constructing a new house for them and the only thing is that his wife hates smoking. After their marriage Abhi is not in a good terms with his elder brother Hari (Sreenivasan). Arun, Unni, Vicky and Tovino are now living in the house of Hariyettan. Hari is a painter, a guide and a philosopher to the youngsters who are living with him. He is also trying to maintain a silent relation with his neighbour, a dance teacher. Her dance classes used to give a positive energy to Hari. The story of the movie is the life of each and every characters above mentioned. The entry of Sherly (Honey Rose) to the life of Abhi turned his life. Sherly is a model as well as a Singer. Her aim was to have relation with Abhi to get chances in her singing profession as he is owning a recording studio. Sherly's glamour helped her to conquer the heart of Abhi. Tovino is running a health club in the city and Unni (Sudhi Koppa), who is a village man is very jealous on the life style of Tovino. And that brings humor elements to the movie and makes it interesting. Arun is in love with a Hindi girl, Diya who is just 16 years of old and they started living together as the direction of Hariyettan. Arun is compelled to go to US by the company as a part of his job and he realized the orginal aim of Diya. Vicky, the fashion photographer was in love with Tina and he believed that it is a pure love but the climax of their story was also an unexpected one. All the characters of the story are facing many problems in their life but only one or two succeeds in it.
title: You Too Brutus
plot: Arun, Tovino and Vicky are bachelors who lead a carefree life. However, their lives are turned upside down when they fall in love with three young women.

Abhi (Asif Ali) is leading a sweet family life with his wife Aparna(Rachana Narayanankutty) and they are very busy with constructing a new house for them and the only thing is that his wife hates smoking. After their marriage Abhi is not in a good terms with his elder brother Hari (Sreenivasan). Arun, Unni, Vicky and Tovino are now living in the house of Hariyettan. Hari is a painter, a guide and a philosopher to the youngsters who are living with him. He is also trying to maintain a silent relation with his neighbour, a dance teacher. Her dance classes used to give a positive energy to Hari. The story of the movie is the life of each and every characters above mentioned. The entry of Sherly (Honey Rose) to the life of Abhi turned his life. Sherly is a model as well as a Singer. Her aim was to have relation with Abhi to get chances in her singing profession as he is owning a recording studio. Sherly's glamour helped her to conquer the heart of Abhi. Tovino is running a health club in the city and Unni (Sudhi Koppa), who is a village man is very jealous on the life style of Tovino. And that brings humor elements to the movie and makes it interesting. Arun is in love with a Hindi girl, Diya who is just 16 years of old and they started living together as the direction of Hariyettan. Arun is compelled to go to US by the company as a part of his job and he realized the orginal aim of Diya. Vicky, the fashion photographer was in love with Tina and he believed that it is a pure love but the climax of their story was also an unexpected one. All the characters of the story are facing many problems in their life but only one or two succeeds in it.::sidarthkaul
